## README

This readme describes the different scripts and how they are connected.

These files contain the results of the analysis on movement data collected via a smartphone.  

run_analysis.R: This script downloads the underlying data, transforms it, and creates a tidy data file summarizing the data.

CodeBook.R: This document describes the data, the individual variables in more detail, along with the transformation/manipulation that was done on the data

tidy_data.txt: This document contains the tidy data, which was generated by the run_analysis.R file.  

README.md: this file
